verbs.description: While [V: attempting] [ARG1: to justify the Trump administration 's policy on family separations on Monday] , [ARG0: Homeland Security secretary Kirstjen Nielsen] called the US a " country of compassion . " She offered little explanation for the manner in which children are being taken away from their parents at the border .
